Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
com.library.library_management.controllers.admin.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/users") public class PersonController extends Object
Controller class for managing users (e.g., library members or staff) in the library management system.

The PersonController provides endpoints to handle CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations associated with users. It interacts with the PersonDAO to perform database operations and communicates with view templates to display data for the administrative interface.

Marked with the Controller annotation, this class functions as part of the Spring MVC framework, processing requests with the base path /users.

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonController

      public PersonController(PersonDAO personDAO)
      Constructs a new PersonController with the specified PersonDAO.
      Parameters:
      personDAO - the DAO used for user-related operations

  • Method Details

    • showPersons

      @GetMapping public String showPersons(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the list of users.

      Fetches a list of all registered users from the data layer using PersonDAO.getAll(), and populates the provided Model with the retrieved Person objects. The returned view template renders the user list in the administrative interface.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view template
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for displaying the users list

    • deleteBook

      @PostMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteBook(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to delete a user by their ID.

      Removes the user identified by the given id from the database using PersonDAO.delete(int), and redirects to the /users endpoint after deletion.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to delete
      Returns:
      a redirect to the users list view

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the form for updating a user's details.

      Fetches the user identified by the given id using PersonDAO.getById(int) and populates the model with the retrieved Person object. The returned view template renders the form for updating the user's information.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view template
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for updating a user

    • updateBook

      @PostMapping("/update") public String updateBook(@ModelAttribute Person user)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to update a user's details.

      Updates the specified Person object in the database using PersonDAO.update(Person). After updating the user, redirects to the /users endpoint to display the updated list of users.

      Parameters:
      user - the updated Person object to save
      Returns:
      a redirect to the users list view

    • showAddForm

      @GetMapping("/add") public String showAddForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the form for adding a new user.

      Initializes a new Person object and populates the model with it to render the form for adding a user in the admin interface.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view template
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for creating a new user

    • addPerson

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addPerson(Person user)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to add a new user.

      Adds the specified Person object to the database using PersonDAO.insert(Person), and redirects to the /users endpoint to show the updated list of users.

      Parameters:
      user - the new Person object to add
      Returns:
      a redirect to the users list view
